h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master
content: Once you've gotten him to around 25% of his health (right between the "M" and "a" in "Master", he'll clutch his head for an extended moment, and that's your cue to back off, as he'll no longer take damage for the moment. When he stabs the ground with his sword again, this time he'll channel a spell to bathe the arena in a golden dome. This is actually a great time to use any consumables you have on hand to buff yourself up, restore cooldowns or get back some Focus for the final phase.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master'.
The content is as follows:
Once you've gotten him to around 25% of his health (right between the "M" and "a" in "Master", he'll clutch his head for an extended moment, and that's your cue to back off, as he'll no longer take damage for the moment. When he stabs the ground with his sword again, this time he'll channel a spell to bathe the arena in a golden dome. This is actually a great time to use any consumables you have on hand to buff yourself up, restore cooldowns or get back some Focus for the final phase.
